data.text: A good morning to you, trainer!!!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: 󠁿A good morning to you, trainer!!!!

data.text:
I can't begin to tell you how excited I am 
to start my new training life…!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
󠁿I can't begin to tell you how excited I am 
󠁿to start my new training life…!

data.text:
I've been running for 8 hours already! 
In the dream I had!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O

choices.text: You mean you came well rested!
You mean you came well rested!

data.processed:
󠁿I've been running for 8 hours already! 
󠁿In the dream I had!!

data.text: Yessir! Of course!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: 󠁿Yessir! Of course!

data.text:
Aah, I can't wait to tell father and mother! 
How I, Bakushin O…
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
󠁿Aah, I can't wait to tell father and mother! 
󠁿How I, Bakushin O…

data.text:
Have decisively won the Arima Kinen, Japan Cup, Tenno Sho, 
Takarazuka Kinen, Kikka Sho, Japan Derby…
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
󠁿Have decisively won the Arima Kinen, Japan Cup, Tenno Sho, 
󠁿Takarazuka Kinen, Kikka Sho, Japan Derby…

data.text:
And have fulfilled my duty as the shining example, 
the class president, to each and every horsegirl……!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
󠁿And have fulfilled my duty as the shining example, 
󠁿the class president, to each and every horsegirl……!

data.text:
Right then! I'm looking forward to our 
first training this afternoon!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
󠁿Right then! I'm looking forward to our 
󠁿first training this afternoon!

data.text:
… She's gonna need a lot of skills to win 
all the GIs she just rambled off.
data.processed:
󠁿… She's gonna need a lot of skills to win 
󠁿all the GIs she just rambled off.

data.text: But what she really needs is…
data.processed: 󠁿But what she really needs is…

data.text: And so—
data.processed: 󠁿And so—

data.text:
Right, trainer, give me your instructions! 
Instructions worthy of an exemplary class president!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
󠁿Right, trainer, give me your instructions! 
󠁿Instructions worthy of an exemplary class president!

data.text:
I handed an enthusiastic Sakura Bakushin O 
the training menu for today.
data.processed:
󠁿I handed an enthusiastic Sakura Bakushin O 
󠁿the training menu for today.

data.text:
Hmhmm… first thing up's footwork on the ladder! 
A perfect warm-up indeed!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
󠁿Hmhmm… first thing up's footwork on the ladder! 
󠁿A perfect warm-up indeed!

data.text:
I'll have it done in three minutes! 
Onwaaards!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
󠁿I'll have it done in three minutes! 
󠁿Onwaaards!!

data.text:
Hah… haa… one down! 
Let's see, next up is… practice starts! Yessir, I'm on it!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
󠁿Hah… haa… one down! 
󠁿Let's see, next up is… practice starts! Yessir, I'm on it!

data.text: On my marks… ready…
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: 󠁿On my marks… ready…

data.text: Onwaaaards!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: 󠁿Onwaaaards!!

data.text:
Haah… haah… phew～! 
I'm feeling the warm and the up!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
󠁿Haah… haah… phew～! 
󠁿I'm feeling the warm and the up!

data.text:
It's high time to move to the main training then! 
As I recall, it starts with an all-out dash interval run…
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
󠁿It's high time to move to the main training then! 
󠁿As I recall, it starts with an all-out dash interval run…

data.text: Hmm? …Hmmhmmmhmmmhmm!?
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: 󠁿Hmm? …Hmmhmmmhmmmhmm!?

data.text: T-Trainer!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: 󠁿T-Trainer!

data.text: What isn't!? This, this menu…
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: 󠁿What isn't!? This, this menu…

data.text: This is a training menu… for short distances!!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: 󠁿This is a training menu… for short distances!!!

data.text:
This can't be right, trainer! 
Did I not tell you I don't intend to be a sprinter!?
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
󠁿This can't be right, trainer! 
󠁿Did I not tell you I don't intend to be a sprinter!?

data.text: And you told me we would win every kind of race!? But this—
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: 󠁿And you told me we would win every kind of race!? But this—

data.text:
I-I'm taking it easy! 
Easy as can be!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
󠁿I-I'm taking it easy! 
󠁿Easy as can be!

data.text:
But trainer, this training is too focused on short-distances!! 
Would longer distances not require a menu centered around paced—
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
󠁿But trainer, this training is too focused on short-distances!! 
󠁿Would longer distances not require a menu centered around paced—

data.text: P-pres…
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: 󠁿P-pres…

data.text:
Phew… my excuses!! 
I, for just one moment, may have lost a liiittle bit of composure!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
󠁿Phew… my excuses!! 
󠁿I, for just one moment, may have lost a liiittle bit of composure!

data.text:
Right then, the calm and collected class president 
will hear you out, so please explain it to me!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O

choices.text: Remember the key to winning races?

data.processed:
󠁿Right then, the calm and collected class president 
󠁿will hear you out, so please explain it to me!

data.text: None other than speed, of course!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: 󠁿None other than speed, of course!!

data.text:
Speed into the lead, always closer to the finish than any other 
horsegirl! The road to victory is sure to open up for you!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
󠁿Speed into the lead, always closer to the finish than any other 
󠁿horsegirl! The road to victory is sure to open up for you!

data.text:
Indeed, speed is the key factor in 
becoming the strongest horsegirl!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
󠁿Indeed, speed is the key factor in 
󠁿becoming the strongest horsegirl!

data.text:
I… I see…! This too is a step towards becoming a model class 
president…! So that was your intention all along…!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
󠁿I… I see…! This too is a step towards becoming a model class 
󠁿president…! So that was your intention all along…!!

data.text:
Come to think of it, you did say that you would lead me to the 
pinnacle of every GI on speed alone…!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
󠁿Come to think of it, you did say that you would lead me to the 
󠁿pinnacle of every GI on speed alone…!

data.text: Trainer… you understood me perfectly from the start!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: 󠁿Trainer… you understood me perfectly from the start!

data.text:
If you say so, then I will follow! 
That's what I've just decided!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
󠁿If you say so, then I will follow! 
󠁿That's what I've just decided!!

data.text:
Well then, I'll be on my way, back to training!! 
Bakushin bakushiiiiiin!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
󠁿Well then, I'll be on my way, back to training!! 
󠁿Bakushin bakushiiiiiin!!

data.text:
In this vein, many days were spent with Sakura Baksuhin O, 
further polishing her speed. Eventually—
data.processed:
󠁿In this vein, many days were spent with Sakura Baksuhin O, 
󠁿further polishing her speed. Eventually—

data.text: Onwaaaards!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: 󠁿Onwaaaards!

data.text: (Wooooooaaaaaaah!!)
data.processed: 󠁿(Wooooooaaaaaaah!!)

data.text:
She shoots out in front, Sakura Bakushin O! 
Wasting no time getting to top speed!! 
Bakushin O with impressive acceleration!!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
󠁿She shoots out in front, Sakura Bakushin O! 
󠁿Wasting no time getting to top speed!! 
󠁿Bakushin O with impressive acceleration!!

data.text: Bakushin bakushin bakushiiiin!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: 󠁿Bakushin bakushin bakushiiiin!!

data.text:
She held her lead the whole way to the finish line!! 
Her overwhelming speed is drawing cheers from the crowd!!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
󠁿She held her lead the whole way to the finish line!! 
󠁿Her overwhelming speed is drawing cheers from the crowd!!

data.text: (Woooooooaaaaaaaah!!)
data.processed: 󠁿(Woooooooaaaaaaaah!!)

data.text:
Aahahaha! 
Behold, the class president!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
󠁿Aahahaha! 
󠁿Behold, the class president!!

data.text:
The winner of this 1200m dirt race, 
on her debut! Sakura Bakushin O!!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
󠁿The winner of this 1200m dirt race, 
󠁿on her debut! Sakura Bakushin O!!

data.text:
—Trainer!! 
Read as "first place" and pronounced "class president", 
that's me, Sakura Bakushin O!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
󠁿—Trainer!! 
󠁿Read as "first place" and pronounced "class president", 
󠁿that's me, Sakura Bakushin O!

data.text:
Hehehe… I put my trust in you, so I won't question why I'm 
debuting at a short distance race!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
󠁿Hehehe… I put my trust in you, so I won't question why I'm 
󠁿debuting at a short distance race!

data.text:
This must just be a preliminary race!! 
I'm pretty sure about that!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
󠁿This must just be a preliminary race!! 
󠁿I'm pretty sure about that!

data.text:
Let's go for it, trainer!! 
One bakushin on the class president's way to all the G1 trophies!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
󠁿Let's go for it, trainer!! 
󠁿One bakushin on the class president's way to all the G1 trophies!!

data.text:
That's right… as she said, let's just 
go ahead and "bakushin" our way.
data.processed:
󠁿That's right… as she said, let's just 
󠁿go ahead and "bakushin" our way.

data.text:
If she continues to refine her speed, she will… eventually… 
The possibility is there… somewhere!
data.processed:
󠁿If she continues to refine her speed, she will… eventually… 
󠁿The possibility is there… somewhere!

data.text: Bakushin bakushiin to the fuuuuture!!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: 󠁿Bakushin bakushiin to the fuuuuture!!!
